title: Organ donation rate in the United Kingdom 2018/19 , by country
yAxis: Rate of donation per million population
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories for the x axis representing Country, and a y axis representing Rate of donation per million population.
The highest category is found at Wales where Rate of donation per million population is 30.7.
The lowest category is found at Scotland where Rate of donation per million population is 17.9.
